question:
Arrange the following treaties and agreements in a chronological order. Select the answer from the codes given below :
1. Indo-US Nuclear Treaty
2. Indo-Soviet Friendship Treaty
3. Tashkent Agreement
4. Shimla Agreement
explanation:
(i) Tashkent Agreement took place in the year 1966
(ii) Indo-Soviet Friendship Treaty took place in the year 1971
(iii) Shimla Agreement took place in the year 1972
(iv) Indo-US Nuclear Treaty took place in the year 2005
